holstein.name: Holstein-Friesian
holstein.description: Holsteins are the most productive dairy cows in the world. They originated in the Netherlands...
holstein.history: The Holstein breed has been developed over centuries in the Netherlands...

angus.name: Angus
angus.description: Angus cattle are prized for their marbled beef and docile temperament...
angus.history: Angus cattle originated in northeastern Scotland...
